description: I want to create and view person's comments
name: T&L Person Comment

elements.name: I go to create a comment for a person page

steps.name: I am on the create comment page for "person" "aac57a95-11e4-9eeb-954a-c2dd5a0a7f31"
I click the save comment button
I can see the timestamp for the created comment

elements.name: Add comment - Relationship between selected record and records in other entities

steps.name: I am on the create comment page for "person" "aac57a95-11e4-9eeb-954a-c2dd5a0a7f31"
